geolocation.access-denied: To continue, please enable geolocation services in your browser. Please refer to your browser’s documentation for instructions on how to enable geolocation services.
geolocation.access-blocked: THE D8X PROTOCOL SOFTWARE WAS NOT DEPLOYED TO BE ACCESSED OR USED BY ANY USER OF A PROHIBITED JURISDICTION. THE PROHIBITED JURISDICTIONS INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO, THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, BELARUS, BURUNDI, BURMA (MYANMAR), CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC, CONGO, DEMOCRATIC REP., DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE’S REPUBLIC OF KOREA (DPRK), GUINEA, GUINEA BISSAU, HAITI, IRAN, IRAQ, YEMEN, LEBANON, LIBYA, MALI, NICARAGUA, SOMALIA, SUDAN, REPUBLIC OF SOUTH SUDAN, SYRIA, VENEZUELA AND ZIMBABWE.
geolocation.not-supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser. To continue, please switch to a browser that supports geolocation.

modify-modal.title: Modify Position
modify-modal.tp-sl-position: Set a TP/SL for your existing position of {{positionSize}}

cancel-modal.title: Cancel Open Order
cancel-modal.content: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

order-size.title: 금액
order-size.body1: Sets the size of your order.
order-size.body2: Your maximal order size, based on your open positions and the state of the exchange, is:
order-size.body3: The minimal position size for this perpetual is:

limit-price.title: 지정가
limit-price.body1: If you specify a limit price your order will be executed at the predetermined limit price or a better price.
limit-price.body2: For a stop order, setting a limit price is optional. A stop order with specified limit price is a stop-limit order, a stop order without specified limit price is a stop-market order.

trigger-price.title: Trigger price
trigger-price.body1: The trigger price is the mark price at which your stop order is triggered.
trigger-price.body2: If you do not select a limit price in addition to your trigger price, you would be placing a stop-market order. Your order will be executed at the best available price once triggered.
trigger-price.body3: If you specify a limit price in addition to your trigger price, you would be placing a stop-limit order. Your order will be executed at the predetermined limit price or a better price.

leverage.title: 레버리지
leverage.body1: Specifies the leverage of your order.
leverage.body2: If your order is reducing an existing position ('partial closure'), the leverage you select has no impact.

expiry.title: Expiry settings
expiry.body: Set the number of days after, which your main order will expire (this setting does not affect your take-profit and stop-loss orders).

stop-loss.title: Stop loss
stop-loss.body1: You can specify a stop loss order to go along with your main order.
stop-loss.body2: If you select e.g. -50%, you create a second order, that will be triggered if your loss on your main order reaches -50%.
stop-loss.body3: Technically, you are specifying a stop-market order, of the opposing side (if your main order is a BUY order, you are specifying a stop-market SELL order). The trigger price is automatically calculated such that your overall loss is as per your selection, assuming you entered at the worst price your slippage settings allow.

take-profit.title: Take profit
take-profit.body1: You can specify a take profit order to go along with your main order.
take-profit.body2: If you select e.g., 100%, you create a second order, that will be triggered if your profit on your main order reaches 100%.
take-profit.body3: Technically, you are specifying a limit order of the opposing side (if your main order is a BUY order, you are specifying a limit SELL order). The limit price is automatically calculated such that your overall profit is as per your selection, assuming you entered at the worst price your slippage settings allow.

validity.closed: Orders won't be executed until market opens
validity.order-too-large: Order will fail: order size is too large
validity.order-too-small: Order will fail: order size is too small
validity.position-too-small: Order will fail: resulting position too small
validity.below-min-position: Warning: order size below minimal position size
validity.insufficient-balance: Order will fail: insufficient wallet balance
validity.undefined: Order undefined: take profit is incompatible with leverage

referrer-tab.disclaimer-text-block1: Earn rebates by inviting traders to trade on D8X. Rebates are airdropped to your wallet weekly.
referrer-tab.disclaimer-text-block2: Check out details on the D8X referral program.
referrer-tab.share-success: Your referral URL is successfully copied to clipboard
referrer-tab.share-error: An error appeared to copy your referral URL

manage-code.instructions: Only UPPERCASE characters, numbers, underscores (_) and hyphens (-) are allowed.

trader-tab.disclaimer-text-block1: Enter a referral code to receive discounts on trading fees.
trader-tab.disclaimer-text-block2: The discounts are airdropped weekly to your wallet.
trader-tab.instructions: You can only link one code to your address. Once the referral relationship has been established, it cannot be changed.

use-code.title: Use this referral code?
use-code.already-linked: You already applied a referral code

earnings.title: Estimated earnings
earnings.info1: Estimated earnings are an approximation of how much you've earned.
earnings.info2: Estimated earnings = d{{poolSymbol}} balance at market value + total {{poolSymbol}} withdrawn - total {{poolSymbol}} deposited

initiated.title: Withdrawal initiated?
initiated.info1: Indicates if you have initated a withdrawal request for the {{poolSymbol}} pool.

withdrawal-amount.title: Withdrawal amount
withdrawal-amount.info1: The amount of d{{poolSymbol}} you initiated to withdraw.
withdrawal-amount.info2: Your liquidity continues to participate in the PnL and fee revenue of the pool until you withdraw.

date.title: Can be withdrawn on
date.info1: You can withdraw your liquidity two days after initializing withdrawal.
date.info2: If you do not withdraw your funds within four days after they are ready to be withdrawn, anyone can execute the withdrawal on your behalf. In this case the funds are sent to your address, and the executor will earn a small fee paid out of your funds.

add.title: Add Liquidity
add.info1: Add {{poolSymbol}} liquidity to the pool and receive d{{poolSymbol}}, an ERC-20 token that represents your ownership in the liquidity pool.
add.info2: As a liquidity provider, you'll earn trading fees and funding rate payments on all trades collateralized in the collateral currency. You'll also participate in the PnL of the pool. d{{poolSymbol}} accumulates fees, funding rate payments and PnL in real-time.

amount.title: Amount of {{poolSymbol}}
amount.info1: Specify the amount of {{poolSymbol}} you want to add to the pool.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Liquidity
withdraw.info1: To withdraw liquidity you first initiate your withdrawal. Keep in mind that it takes 48 hours to process your request and you can only have one withdrawal request at a time.
withdraw.info2: After 48 hours, a withdrawable amount of d{{poolSymbol}} can be exchanged for {{poolSymbol}} at the d{{poolSymbol}} Price.

initiate.title: 1. Initiate withdrawal of {{poolSymbol}}
initiate.info1: Specify the amount of d{{poolSymbol}} you want to exchange for {{poolSymbol}}.
initiate.info2: After 48 hours, this amount can be converted to {{poolSymbol}} and can be withdrawn from the pool.

action.title: Withdraw {{poolSymbol}}
action.info1: This amount can be converted to {{poolSymbol}}, which can be withdrawn from the pool.

one-click-modal.title: One-click trading
one-click-modal.description: One-click trading allows you to post and cancel orders by delegating these actions to a secondary account owned by you.

create-delegate.title: Create Delegate Account
create-delegate.description: As an initial step you need to create a Delegate Account.
create-delegate.create-success-result: Delegate account is created and One-click trading is activated.

manage-delegate.title: Manage Delegate Account
manage-delegate.activate-success-result: One-click trading activated. If you reload or leave the page you will have to activate one-click trading again.
manage-delegate.activate-error-result: Invalid wallet. Re-set your delegate and try again.

funding-modal.title: Fund delegate wallet
funding-modal.description: Fund your delegate wallet to pay for gas.
